about.title: About Us
about.description1: AiTeamDev is a cutting-edge development company leveraging the power of AI to deliver innovative solutions. We specialize in creating professional websites, custom software, and engaging games.
about.description2: Founded by a team of AI specialists, we bring together creative design and technical expertise to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to high-quality development services through AI-powered solutions that are both affordable and effective.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading provider of AI-assisted development services for businesses of all sizes.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Innovation, Quality, Efficiency, and Client Satisfaction are at the core of everything we do.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description1: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.description2: Our AI team is ready to assist with your development needs within your budget constraints.

inquiry.title: Project Inquiry
inquiry.description: Ready to start your project? Contact us for a free consultation.

support.title: Support
support.description: Existing clients can reach our support team for assistance.
